alert.note: Alert for Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 1:16PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lucie, southeastern Okeechobee and northwestern Martin Counties through 145 PM EST... At 116 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near J And S Fish Camp, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Indiantown, J And S Fish Camp, and Taylor Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
